backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with header, sidebar navigation, documentation sections, and OTP playground integration.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Simple code block renderer showing labeled, scrollable code snippets.
frontend/src/components/DocSection.tsx: Renders a documentation section with paragraphs, lists, alerts, code blocks, and tables.
frontend/src/docs/docsContent.ts: Defines documentation section schema and the full content for all app documentation topics.
frontend/src/features/playground/clipboa: Implements browser clipboard copy with fallback and optional timed auto-clear behavior.
frontend/src/features/playground/otpExtr: Extracts 4â€“8 digit OTP codes from messages using regex and heuristics to filter valid candidates.
frontend/src/features/playground/OtpPlay: UI component to test OTP extraction, copy to clipboard, and clipboard auto-clear settings using sample messages.
frontend/src/features/playground/useClip: React hook that stores and retrieves clipboard auto-clear delay settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, dark mode themes, and scrollbar/UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for building an offline, privacy-compliant Android OTP auto-copy app using SMS User Consent/Retriever APIs. Lists architecture notes, existing features, and design constraints for documentation, platform limitations, and an OTP extraction playground.
